dcterms:description: The StarCraft II micromanagement tasks dataset is used to evaluate multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms in a complex real-time strategy game environment, providing a benchmark for performance comparison.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II micromanagement tasks

dcterms:creator: Caroline Claus
Craig Boutilier
dcterms:description: The cooperative matrix games dataset is used to study the dynamics of reinforcement learning in cooperative multi-agent systems, providing a framework for evaluating coordination and learning strategies.
dcterms:title: Cooperative matrix games

dcterms:creator: Tong Wu
Pan Zhou
Kai Liu
Yali Yuan
Xiumin Wang
Huawei Huang
Dapeng Oliver Wu
dcterms:description: The urban traffic light control dataset is utilized for training multi-agent deep reinforcement learning algorithms to optimize traffic light timings in vehicular networks.
dcterms:title: Urban traffic light control dataset

dcterms:creator: Anamika Sharma
Siddhartha Chauhan
dcterms:description: The sensor network management dataset is designed for evaluating distributed reinforcement learning algorithms aimed at maintaining coverage and connectivity in wireless sensor networks.
dcterms:title: Sensor network management dataset

dcterms:creator: Chao Yu
Xin Wang
Xin Xu
Minjie Zhang
Hongwei Ge
Jiankang Ren
Liang Sun

dcterms:description: The autonomous vehicle coordination dataset is used to evaluate distributed multi-agent coordinated learning for autonomous driving scenarios on highways, focusing on dynamic coordination among vehicles.
dcterms:title: Autonomous vehicle coordination dataset
